text:
We collect this information for the purpose of providing the Service, identifying and communicating with you, responding to your requests/inquiries, servicing your purchase orders, and improving our services.
We use cookies to collect information in order to improve our services for you.

We process only as much information as is necessary to provide our Services and the institution may access, delete or withdraw consent for continued processing of the student's information at any time.
While using our Service, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you.
We may also collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our Service ("Log Data").
PeerKonnect LLC ("us", "we", or "our") operates the https://peerkonnect.org/ website (the "Service").
These third parties have access to your Personal Information only to perform specific tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use your information for any other purpose.

In addition, pertaining to data retention, in particular for 3rd party apps, like Zoom customer data, which we rely on to provide Zoom meeting capabilites for students, we will retain your Personal Information for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Notice unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
We use your Personal Information for providing and improving the Service.
Where the institution instructs us to collect Personal Information from children under the age of 13, we process such information solely to provide our Services to the student on its behalf and for the purposes set forth in our agreement with the institution and as described in this Policy.

In addition, pertaining to data retention, in particular for 3rd party apps, like Zoom customer data, which we rely on to provide Zoom meeting capabilites for students, we will retain your Personal Information for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Notice unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
We use your Personal Information for providing and improving the Service.
Where the institution instructs us to collect Personal Information from children under the age of 13, we process such information solely to provide our Services to the student on its behalf and for the purposes set forth in our agreement with the institution and as described in this Policy.
